title: About
subtext: I'm a Computer Science student based in Edinburgh. I enjoy learning new things. At the moment, I'm currently interested in learning about hardware, as well as backend development.

title: Tutoring
subtext: I offer a tutoring service for high school students taking their National 5s (GCSE) and Highers (AS Level) for Computing Science. I also provide a mentoring service for developers of any skill who need guidance or a second pair of eyes on their project
